titles.title: Used Car Safety Recall Repair Act
A bill to require auto dealers to fix outstanding safety recalls before selling or leasing a used passenger motor vehicle.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
4/13/2015--Introduced. Used Car Safety Recall Repair Act
Prohibits a dealer from selling or leasing a used passenger motor vehicle until a defect of the motor vehicle or motor vehicle equipment or noncompliance with a federal motor vehicle safety standard has been remedied.
